EmailTemplate.name: Need Patent Search Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Order #
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you choosing LegalZoom.
Your order includes a Patent Search, which is a detailed search of existing Patent applications that may be relevant to your invention. We recently completed the search and sent you the results, along with a guide on how to read the report.
The purpose of the Patent Search is to help you determine the patentability of your invention by identifying any possible conflicts in advance. When reviewing the report, if you determine you would like to examine any listing in greater detail, you can obtain a free copy here. Under "Search", select either Issued Patents or Published Applications. Choose Number Search and enter the number of the listing you'd like to view. These numbers are located just below the illustrations in the Primary and Secondary sections of your report.
We are currently awaiting your response. After reviewing your results, if you determine you would like to move forward with your application or if you have any questions, simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
